singleItemContent: What technology do you often use, computers or mobile phones?
What electronic devices have you bought lately?
Are there any technology you want to buy?
Describe a friend from your childhood
And explain what made you like him/her
Do you still keep in touch with your friends from childhood? Why or why not?
What do you think online social media?
Do you think online social media will replace face to fafe communication?
Do you use a loto of imojis online? Why ?
